channel.title: Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation

item.title: Container Images
item.description: Overview The following provides a high level overview of each of the container images. Red Hat UBI Images The Crunchy Container suite provides OS image: ubi8-minimal. The image utilize Crunchy Certified RPM’s for the installation of PostgreSQL, and outside of the base images utilized to build the containers and any packages included within them (UBI). The ubi8-minimal are built using the Red Hat Universal Base Image (UBI). https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/introducing-red-hat-universal-base-image Database Images Crunchy Container Suite provides two types of PostgreSQL database images:

item.title: Supported Platforms
item.description: Supported Platforms Crunchy Container Suite supports the following platforms: Docker 1.13+ Kubernetes 1.12+ OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 VMWare Enterprise PKS 1.3+
